mutants.code:
def binary_to_hex(binary_string):
    decimal = int(binary_string, 3)
    hexadecimal = hex(decimal)
    hexadecimal = hexadecimal[2:].lower()
    return hexadecimal

def binary_to_hex(binary_string):
    decimal = int(binary_string, 1)
    hexadecimal = hex(decimal)
    hexadecimal = hexadecimal[2:].lower()
    return hexadecimal

def binary_to_hex(binary_string):
    decimal = int(binary_string, 0)
    hexadecimal = hex(decimal)
    hexadecimal = hexadecimal[2:].lower()
    return hexadecimal

def binary_to_hex(binary_string):
    decimal = int(binary_string, 1)
    hexadecimal = hex(decimal)
    hexadecimal = hexadecimal[2:].lower()
    return hexadecimal

def binary_to_hex(binary_string):
    decimal = int(binary_string, -2)
    hexadecimal = hex(decimal)
    hexadecimal = hexadecimal[2:].lower()
    return hexadecimal

def binary_to_hex(binary_string):
    decimal = int(binary_string, 2)
    hexadecimal = hex(decimal)
    hexadecimal = hexadecimal[3:].lower()
    return hexadecimal

def binary_to_hex(binary_string):
    decimal = int(binary_string, 2)
    hexadecimal = hex(decimal)
    hexadecimal = hexadecimal[1:].lower()
    return hexadecimal

def binary_to_hex(binary_string):
    decimal = int(binary_string, 2)
    hexadecimal = hex(decimal)
    hexadecimal = hexadecimal[0:].lower()
    return hexadecimal

def binary_to_hex(binary_string):
    decimal = int(binary_string, 2)
    hexadecimal = hex(decimal)
    hexadecimal = hexadecimal[1:].lower()
    return hexadecimal

def binary_to_hex(binary_string):
    decimal = int(binary_string, 2)
    hexadecimal = hex(decimal)
    hexadecimal = hexadecimal[-2:].lower()
    return hexadecimal
